title: Border wall negotiations, US/China Trade talks
itunes:title: Border wall negotiations, US/China Trade talks
description:
Kevin discusses the divide between Republicans and Democrats over a border wall and what to expect from US/China trade talks. 

Guests:David Litt, former Obama speechwriter, Marc Lotter, Former Special Assistant to Pres. Trump & Former Press Secretary for VP Mike Pence, Shannon Pettypiece, Bloomberg News White House reporter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
